properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Channels only Blessed Master But with all Thy wondrous pow'r Flowing through us Thou canst use us Ev'ry day and ev'ry hour{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}How I praise Thee precious Savior That Thy love laid hold of me Thou hast saved and cleansed And filled me That I might Thy channel be{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Just a channel full of blessing To the thirsty hearts around To tell out Thy full salvation All Thy loving message sound{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Emptied that Thou shouldst fill me A clean vessel in Thy hand With no pow'r but as Thou givest Graciously with each command{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Witnessing Thy power to save me Setting free from self and sin Thou hast bought me to possess me In Thy fullness Lord come in{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus fill now with Thy Spirit Hearts that full surrender know That the streams of living water From our inner man may flow{/lang-eng}
